text:
Snegurochka looked at Santa School with a clear expression.
The many memories from the special winter filled her heart.

options.text: Well done on the shoot.
It's off-season for Santa School now, huh?
I had a lot of fun too.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Santas work so hard for the next Christmas...
I have to do my best too!

name: Snegurochka
text:
But you know, just as Brother Jack said,
I want to challenge myself with various things!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The show is continuing, and I've been invited to be a weather caster and a guest on talk shows.
I feel like I can make even more people smile.

options.text: Do your best, I'm cheering for you.
I'm looking forward to it.
I'll watch the weather forecast every day!

name: Snegurochka
text:
[Player]-san, thank you!
And about that... you know.

Snegurochka, which was rare for her,
fidgeted with her fingers and spoke hesitantly.

name: Snegurochka
text:
As a celebration for officially becoming a Transient
and a magical girl in a contract with you, um—

name: Snegurochka
text:
[Player]-san, would you like to
go to Snowland together after school?

Now that Snegurochka had avoided the fate of disappearing
with the end of winter, many wishes were sprouting within her.

name: Snegurochka
text:
The gentle warmth of spring, flowers I've never seen, unfamiliar roads home...
I wonder if we can all go to the beach in the summer?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I want to wear a yukata, go to a fireworks festival and eat shaved ice.
I also want to try eating nagashi somen.

And so, the feelings she had unconsciously given up on
because she couldn't welcome spring began to sprout.

Snegurochka looked into her compact mirror
and twirled the ends of her hair.

name: Snegurochka
text:
If I can spend spring and beyond,
maybe I can become a wonderful lady myself.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I wonder if I can experience a romance
that sets my heart ablaze, like of that in romantic dramas.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's why, [Player]-san, I will try
to grow up a little and become an adult.

Because, a magical girl's story always involves a bittersweet
feeling towards the mysterious senior who saves them.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, [Player]-san, over here!
Ehehe, I was so excited I couldn't sleep last night!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Because of that, I was sleepy in class and kept dozing off,
and everyone mistook it for me having an early morning recording.

options.text: You do seem to be pretty excited.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
I've decided to have the best time ever today!

options.text: Let's have a lot of fun today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes! It's already fun even though we haven't done anything yet!
It's definitely going to be the best day ever!

options.text: You look stylish today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really!?
Ehehe, that makes me very happy.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, that's right, let's take a picture together!
As a keepsake of our memories together!

Snegurochka took out her phone, and she and
[Player] made a peace sign to fit into the frame.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, everyone will be so jealous.
They'll know I have [Player]-san all to myself.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, by the way, [Player]-san, where are you from?
Who gave birth to you?

options.text: I have no memories of those, actually.
I don't even know where I'm from.
I don't think I have a creator?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, amnesia!?
I'm sorry, I've asked you something inappropriate...

name: Snegurochka
text:
But that's not necessarily a bad thing.
You see, I have memories of being born to help Santa, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
So I've lived my life that way, but if you
don't have that, it means you have all kinds of possibilities!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm finally starting to understand
a little bit of what Grandpa used to say.

name: Snegurochka
text:
'Don't worry about us, Snegurochka.
You're free to do whatever you want'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
How was my impression of him?
I think I did a pretty good job, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I think Grandpa felt guilty for
creating me that way.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But as for me, I'm just very grateful
that he created me in the first place.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I want to repay that gratitude, but Grandpa wants me to
use my limited time for myself... I guess we were always at odds.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's why I'm trying to figure out what my own wishes are,
in order to grant his wish.

options.text: That's a wonderful thing.
If there's anything I can do, I'll help.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yay!
You're so dependable, I might ask you for a lot of things.

options.text: So could today's invitation have been to―

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes, you're right.
It was the first thing that came to my mind.

name: Snegurochka
text:
So, [Player]-san, it means you don't
have a close person like that just yet, right?

Unbeknownst to [Player], Snegurochka was pumping
her fist close to her heart.

options.text: I don't really have a close person that comes to mind.
When you say close, I do have a self-proclaimed older sister.
There are many self-proclaimed brothers, and then a self-proclaimed son too.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh, yes, a close person, like family...
Wait, self-proclaimed...? What do you mean by that!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Is it like Brother Jack to me?
But Brother didn't self-proclaim it...

options.text: It's a good thing to rely on someone like that.
To be honest, it's a bit of a shameless act.
Would you be happy if I called you 'little sister'?

name: Snegurochka
text:
But... [Player]-san.
I don't want to be a little sister, so—

name: Snegurochka
text:
But I know I'm not a grown-up yet,
so I have to... I've decided!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I, Snegurochka, hereby declare
that I will become your future lover!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Isn't that great?
[Player]-san!

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Was that too sudden?
Oh no, my face is turning red.

options.text: I'm happy, Snegurochka.
If you don't change your mind in five years, that is.
(Smile with a half-troubled expression)

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, it was my secret mission for today.
To declare my feelings to you, [Player]-san.

name: Snegurochka
text:
The only thing left is my main mission!
To have the best time ever today!

Though her voice still carried a hint of shyness,
Snegurochka had a look of accomplishment on her face.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I think I finally figured out
why I was so interested in you, [Player]-san.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Maybe it's because we're similar in a way, even if our circumstances are different.
The way we live, in the present.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I had no future,
and [Player]-san had no past.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But of course, that was just the beginning, wasn't it?
I just found out about your amnesia, too...

options.text: I see, that makes a lot of sense.
We have no choice but to live in the present, huh?
But now, there's a future... right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Right now, I have a future that
everyone and Brother Jack have given to me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
So I'm going to cherish it,
and live my life to the fullest!

name: Snegurochka
text:
So, first things first... [Player]-san!
I want to meet the people who call themselves your family.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Because they are also like family to me, right?
I have to introduce myself to them.

name: Snegurochka
text:
And I have to determine if they are
worthy of calling themselves your family, [Player]-san.

name: Snegurochka
text:
As your future lover and magical girl,
I'll protect your dream from anything that might harm it.

Snegurochka smiled and pulled [Player]
towards the attractions.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But, we'll do that later!
Right now, you're all mine, [Player]-san.

name: Snegurochka
text:
To make the most of this time,
let's have a lot of fun!

The two of them continued to visit
attractions as long as time permitted.

After a while of playing at full throttle,
the two of them sat down on a bench to rest.

options.text: Here's your Frosty ice cream.
Isn't ice cream too cold...? Oh, never mind.
Sorry, I took a while to get it.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you!
Frosty's ice cream is the best in this amusement park.

The popular mascot 'Frosty' is known throughout Tokyo.
The ice cream was shaped just like his face.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Do you want a bite, [Player]-san?
I'll give you the most delicious part, the nose.

note:
so the ice cream is shaped as his face
I see, I see

options.text: Aah!
Should we take a picture and send it to Jack?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a great idea!
Wait a moment...

The two of them leaned in and opened their mouths wide,
as if they planned take a bite at Jack, and took a picture.

options.text: I'll feed you instead.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, I did it!
I've fulfilled another dream that I couldn't before!

Snegurochka, a snow fairy, finished
her ice cream at an incredible speed.

And then, she gently rested her
head on [Player]'s shoulder.

options.text: What's wrong, Snegurochka?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I don't know, my heart is pounding so much.
I keep thinking that I really... haven't disappeared yet.

options.text: You're acting like a spoiled child~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wonder how we look right now.
Maybe not now, but someday, we'll look like lovers.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right now, my heart is pounding so much.
I keep thinking, that I really... haven't disappeared yet.

options.text: (Adjust your position so it's not painful)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wonder how we look right now.
Maybe not now, but someday, we'll look like lovers.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right now, my heart is pounding so much.
I keep thinking, that I really... haven't disappeared yet.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Humans disappear in about 80 years,
but I was supposed to disappear in one winter.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But, is this really okay?
Did I do something I shouldn't have?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Or maybe, this anxiety is just for a moment,
and I'll forget it when I become an adult?

name: Snegurochka
text:
My end was supposed to be given, but now,
I feel even more anxious when it's no longer there.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I guess it's the fear of the unknown.
Sometimes, when I'm alone at night, I wonder how long this will last.

options.text: Snegurochka, you're strong.
I know, I think about it sometimes too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so... I'm not alone, am I?
That makes me feel a little relieved... Ehehe.

options.text: Isn't that what everyone feels as well?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so... I'm not alone, am I?
That makes me feel a little relieved... Ehehe.

text:
A long silence fell between
[Player] and Snegurochka.

It was not [Player] or Snegurochka who broke the silence—
It was the snow reindeer next to Snegurochka.

The snow reindeer, Roo-chan, who was next to Snegurochka,
climbed onto [Player]'s shoulder and started playing.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Whoa, that's weird.
Roo-chan usually only gets attached to other snow fairies.

options.text: I've always wondered, what is a snow reindeer?
What is Roo-chan?
It may be a mysterious creature, but it's cute.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Roo-chan is Roo-chan!
I think it's an existence I created, just like Grandpa did with me.

options.text: You think...?
Snegurochka, even you don't know yourself!?
The mystery just deepens...

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Well, yes, it's definitely a part of me.
I thought I could only spend time with other snow fairies.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But it's strange that it became so cute.
My art and crafts skills are truly terrible.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Or maybe there's something inside me that I don't know about,
and it took a form? Anyway—

name: Snegurochka
text:
It seems Roo-chan can feel my feelings
and acts on its own, and vice versa.

As they were talking, Roo-chan pressed
its mouth against [Player]'s cheek.

name: Snegurochka
text:
H-Hey, Roo-chan!?
What are you doing—!!

Snegurochka screamed and quickly
picked up Roo-chan onto her arms.

options.text: Ahaha, that's cute~
I'm so popular, it's embarrassing.
You don't have to panic, I'm alright.

name: Snegurochka
text:
(I-I was holding myself back, too,
because I thought it was too soon...)

In Snegurochka's arms,
Roo-chan snorted proudly.

options.text: Hey, wait a minute...?
Roo-chan understands your feelings, right?
(Show a face of realization)

name: Snegurochka
text:
N-No, that's not it!
It's just a greeting from Roo-chan to a person it's fond of...

options.text: Oh, I see, that's what it was!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, that's right!
Ahahahaha, you're so silly, [Player]-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
(Oh, that was close...
I was just about to start a new future...!)

options.text: Snegurochka, it's okay if you'd do the same thing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Really? [Player]-san.<br<Then... please close your eyes, it's embarrassing.
As [Player] closed their eyes, as instructed, a cold sensation was felt on their cheek.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is your fault, [Player]-san, not mine!
I was just about to start a new future...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you're going to be like that, I won't hold back either!
The snow reindeer, who had returned to its original position, was clapping its hands happily.

options.text: (Kiss Snegurochka on her cheek)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...!
You fool, [Player]-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was just about to start a new future, but you ruined it!
You have no idea what I'm feeling...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you're going to be like that, I won't hold back either!
Snegurochka's face was flushed red, and her cold hands held [Player]'s face close.
Then, a soft and cold sensation was felt on [Player]'s cheeks.
The snow reindeer, who had returned to its original position, was clapping its hands happily.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ahhh, my face is so red.
This wasn't supposed to happen today...

Saying that, Snegurochka took out
a gift box from her bag.

name: Snegurochka
text:
This is for you, [Player]-san.
I want you to open it here.

[Player] untied the ribbon on the beautifully wrapped box,
and a snow globe appeared from inside.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, it's a custom-made snow globe.
Not a commercial magical girl one, but the real me as a magical girl!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I thought it might be a little embarrassing to give
you a snow globe of myself, but I really wanted you to display it.

options.text: Thank you, I'm very happy.
It's so cute!!
The quality is amazing!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm glad you liked it!
If you press this button on the side, snow will flutter inside!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The magic circle at my feet will light up,
and it'll look like I'm using magic, isn't that amazing!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Please think of it as me
and cherish it, [Player]-san.

Snegurochka smiled shyly.
Just then, the announcement for the end of their dream-like time began to play.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...It's already over, huh?
But I'm not lonely, because there's always a next time!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, [Player]-san.
Will you come play with me again?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Not just at the amusement park, but in other places too.
It's fun with everyone, but sometimes, just the two of us, like today.

options.text: Of course, I'd love to!
I'll come again.
Can't refuse my little sister's request, can I?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, it's a promise!
[Player]-san!

As [Player] stood up to leave, Snegurochka,
who was still sitting, held out her hand.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I want to hold hands and go home together.
Please, [Player]-san!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Or maybe...
Are my hands too cold for you?

options.text: That sure sounds like something I can't refuse.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, that's right.
You can't look down on me just because I'm your little sister!

options.text: I'm glad that you asked.

dialogue_after_selection.text: At [Player]'s words, Snegurochka smiled happily.

options.text: It's alright, Snegurochka.

dialogue_after_selection.text: At [Player]'s words, Snegurochka smiled happily.

text:
The two of them left the amusement park.
Were they like close siblings, or—

Could they really become future lovers?
No one could possibly know the outcome—

That magical girl is back, powered up!?
Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka, Season 2!

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's almost spring, and a new semester!
I wonder if I'll be in the same class as everyone and that person~?

Snegurochka, who was supposed to have disappeared,
had returned to everyone!

Amidst the fluttering cherry blossom petals,
a new transfer student who would make her heart flutter arrived.

Next time, Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka Season 2,
Episode 1 Special, 'Spring Has Come to Snegurochka'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, I'm sure we'll meet again in this place!
The magic of our promise, Kira-Kira Pappah, Piraporepah!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
To your heart, right in front of the screen—
Make-up Snow Maiden!!
